Description: MCBRIDE MUSIC & PAWN ESP LTD PHOENIX 200 ELECTRIC GUITAR, BLACK Description: ESP LTD PHOENIX 200, BLACK, VERY GOOD CONDITION. ONLY A FEW SMALL DINGS TO BODY, TWO DINGS TO BACK OF NECK, SOME LIGHT PLAYWEAR & BUCKLE RASH TO FINISH. SOME MINOR FINISH IMPERFECTIONS AROUND 5-7TH FRETS ON SIDE OF NECK. LOW E STRING TUNING PEG LOOSE WHEN STRING IS SLACK (WORKS NORMALLY AT TENSION). PLAYS EXCELLENTLY, SOUNDS GREAT. A KILLER NECK-THRU LTD WITH TWO HUMBUCKERS, A 25.5" SCALE LENGTH, AND A FULLY BOUND NECK.
